website_summaries.verdict: A tasty juice cleanse that goes a long way, can be mixed into any drink, and delivers results.
pros: With its sweet, tangy flavor and organic ingredients, this powdered formula with more than 20 fruits and berries and 5 grams of fiber is a great choice for those seeking a quality cleanse at a value price
cons: It takes a bit of stirring to dissolve, and some users may initially experience a laxative effect – but this is also an indication of its powerful effects

customer_reviews.title: Gives me an extra boost.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for giving me the extra boost for the day I often need. I find this to be more of a protein drink, than any kind of cleans,. but tastes great. And, of all the flavors, this one is the least expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jancie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE OJC Super Reds. I feel amazing and it tastes amazing. I only add OJC to water and I love the taste of it. I am a very on the go person so it is nice to be able to get all the benefits of fruits without having to take the time to eat them all. And I have even noticed that I have lost a good amount of weight in my stomach since I have started using OJC. I wish I had exact numbers but I did not weight myself before hand. So if you are looking to feel healthy and look healthy, buy OJC and start drinking it now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes magnificent
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this product. It's great blended with frozen fruit and almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: Chastity

customer_reviews.title: Tastes very good without the grittyness
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this because it does taste good as advertised without the grittyness.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P

customer_reviews.title: cranberry magic
customer_reviews.text: Use this frequently for support of my bladder and love the taste in my smoothies
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this. This is disgusting. It doesnt mix completely with water (ever. Hot, cold, doesn't matter. Will NEVER fully mix) so you have these constant inconsistencies and chunks of powder in it and after a few hours it starts feeling SLIMY. This is disgusting and a rip off. Dont buy.
customer_reviews.author: April Smith

customer_reviews.title: It tastes great as well
customer_reviews.text: My husband drinks this mixed with water almost daily. He says his energy has increased and it helps that this product keeps him "regular". It tastes great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: You can see the berries when you make the drink.
customer_reviews.text: I love this organic juice cleanse! It tastes amazing, I crave it every morning, and it really gives me energy for the day! Can’t say enough about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie DeGidio

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I love taking this product! I feel much healthier when I do! It helps me be more regular and I don’t get bloated as much. I love the peace of mind that comes with knowing I’m cleansing my system.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: The OJC tastes really good.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in the time they said, The OJC tastes really good.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: taste is good
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant enough taste, but I haven't noticed anything different yet..
customer_reviews.author: Christyb

customer_reviews.title: Like the Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Good for my digestion. My problems have ceased . I will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great taste! Energy boost
customer_reviews.text: I received it early which it’s great! I just put one scoop of this product into 8 oz cold water and shake it until mixed , the taste is delicious!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia  woodley

customer_reviews.title: OJC Super Reds are a must if you’re juicing...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love OJC Super Reds! Compared to OJC Greens they win on taste hands down. I can barely choke the Greens down but Reds I can drink alone or add to them and have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Willingham

customer_reviews.title: Hard to mix
customer_reviews.text: Hard to say if working, mixes badly and tons of clumps Have to choke it down
customer_reviews.author: Frank P

customer_reviews.title: Red
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good...and tastes great with orange juice!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Fred

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Berry one and the Chocolate one !

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product - all your vitamins and nutrients. Great tasting to.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It taste good but does not mix as easily as the organic juice plus.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Prepare it right and it’s great
customer_reviews.text: Like in my other reviews of these OJC Products; if you get a 12 ounce mini blender and mix frozen fruit with pineapple or orange juice it tastes very good. The benefits and ease of quick juicing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ironhardt

customer_reviews.title: But not as good as juicing the real thing
customer_reviews.text: OK, But not as good as juicing the real thing!
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: Taste is yuck and it's grainy. So much so that I cough every time I force it down :(
customer_reviews.author: nautiluschelle

customer_reviews.title: Taste is wonderful. Was able to lose 7 pounds post the ...
customer_reviews.text: Taste is wonderful. Was able to lose 7 pounds post the 3days cleanse. Post that have been using it everyday with my lunch(grilled chicken/fish) haven't gained back(1pound only) Have been wonderfully pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pubali Sen

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Tastes great - I have tried mixing ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Tastes great - I have tried mixing it with 1% milk and almond milk for more of a creamy flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cleanse after hitting a weight loss plateau. This was exactly what I was looking for. I lost 10 lbs. Plus, It’s super tasty (I love beets) and it has natural fiber. I’ve tried juice cleanses in the past and I normally get fed up after I clean my juicer. I will absolutely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: ChiShopaholic14

customer_reviews.title: Suppresses my appetite!
customer_reviews.text: Great product,suppresses my appetite, works as advertised.I will recommend to others and will utilize this product in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Ruff

customer_reviews.title: Lots of great ingredients and I notice a difference in energy level ...
customer_reviews.text: We mix it into smoothies or put it into water bottles and shake. Lots of great ingredients and I notice a difference in energy level when I don’t take it so I know it works.
customer_reviews.author: anyacorvin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: taste is thick and terrible. powder is gritty, and doesn't dissolve well.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did a 3 day juice cleanse product was affordable taste was great

customer_reviews.title: Good product to use after a week of using you ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product to use after a week of using you will feel the difference but like anything I would recommend not over using this product

customer_reviews.text: The product is awesome it stop my rheumatism in my legs in my hands that's right I said it don't hate 😃
